head.title: National Briefing | Washington: Suit On Global Warming Report Is Dismissed

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | Washington: Suit On Global Warming Report Is Dismissed

abstract.p: Competitive Enterprise Institute's lawsuit seeking to prevent Bush administration from releasing analysis projecting many harmful repercussion of global warming is dismissed for technical reasons (S)

block.p: A lawsuit seeking to stop the Bush administration from disseminating an assessment of the impacts of global warming has been dismissed for technical reasons. The suit had been filed by the Competitive Enterprise Institute, a group with industry backing, contending that the analysis, which was done in the Clinton administration and projects many harmful repercussions if temperatures rise, did not meet federal standards for the quality of data.

A lawsuit seeking to stop the Bush administration from disseminating an assessment of the impacts of global warming has been dismissed for technical reasons. The suit had been filed by the Competitive Enterprise Institute, a group with industry backing, contending that the analysis, which was done in the Clinton administration and projects many harmful repercussions if temperatures rise, did not meet federal standards for the quality of data.
